message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer benefits us both.
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
This offer still gives you a good deal, Bob, and considers the time pressure.

Bob, this is cutting it close.  Take this offer and we both benefit before inflation eats further into things.
Inflation is really hurting you now. This might be your last decent chance.
